operation.name: insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO f_capital_appropriation_apply (form_id, out_biz_no, project_code, project_name, customer_id, customer_name, busi_type, busi_type_name, project_type, attach, is_receipt, remark, is_simple, raw_add_time) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
operation.sqlmap: INSERT INTO f_capital_appropriation_apply (form_id, out_biz_no, project_code, project_name, customer_id, customer_name, busi_type, busi_type_name, project_type, attach, is_receipt, remark, is_simple, raw_add_time) VALUES (#formId#,#outBizNo#,#projectCode#, #projectName#,#customerId#,#customerName#,#busiType#,#busiTypeName#, #projectType#, #attach#,#isReceipt#,#remark#,#isSimple#,#rawAddTime#) <selectKey resultClass ="long" keyProperty ="applyId" > SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID </selectKey>

operation.name: update
operation.sql: UPDATE f_capital_appropriation_apply SET form_id=?, out_biz_no=?, project_code=?, project_name=?, customer_id=?, customer_name=?, busi_type=?, busi_type_name=?, project_type=?, attach=?, is_receipt=?, remark=?, is_simple=? WHERE apply_id=?

operation.name: updateByFormId
operation.sql: UPDATE f_capital_appropriation_apply SET out_biz_no=?, project_code=?, project_name=?, customer_id=?, customer_name=?, busi_type=?, busi_type_name=?, project_type=?, attach=?, is_receipt=?, remark=?, is_simple=? WHERE form_id=?

operation.name: findByCondition
operation.sqlmap:
SELECT * from f_capital_appropriation_apply where 1=1 <dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="fCapitalAppropriationApply.applyId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> apply_id = #fCapitalAppropriationApply.applyId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="fCapitalAppropriationApply.formId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> form_id = #fCapitalAppropriationApply.formId# </isGreaterThan>
<isNotEmpty property="fCapitalAppropriationApply.projectCode" prepend=" and "> project_code = #fCapitalAppropriationApply.projectCode# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="fCapitalAppropriationApply.projectName" prepend=" and "> project_name like concat('%',#fCapitalAppropriationApply.projectName#,'%') </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="fCapitalAppropriationApply.projectType" prepend=" and "> project_type like concat('%',#fCapitalAppropriationApply.projectType#,'%') </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="fCapitalAppropriationApply.isReceipt" prepend=" and "> is_receipt = #fCapitalAppropriationApply.isReceipt# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="fCapitalAppropriationApply.isSimple" prepend=" and "> is_simple = #fCapitalAppropriationApply.isSimple# </isNotEmpty> </dynamic> <isNotEmpty property="sortCol" prepend=" order by "> $sortCol$ <isNotEmpty property="sortOrder"> $sortOrder$ </isNotEmpty> </isNotEmpty> LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#;

operation.name: findByConditionCount
operation.sqlmap:
SELECT count(*) FROM f_capital_appropriation_apply where 1=1 <dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="applyId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> apply_id = #applyId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="formId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> form_id = #formId# </isGreaterThan>
<isNotEmpty property="projectCode" prepend=" and "> project_code = #projectCode# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="projectName" prepend=" and "> project_name like concat('%',#projectName#,'%') </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="projectType" prepend=" and "> project_type like concat('%',#projectType#,'%') </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="isSimple" prepend=" and "> is_simple = #isSimple# </isNotEmpty> </dynamic>
